# Articulated [Manipulator](Manipulator.qmd)
- A [manipulator](Manipulator.qmd) with an arm that is broken into sections (links) by one or more joints. Each of the joints represents a degree of freedom in the [manipulator](Manipulator.qmd) system and allows translation and rotary motion.
